NCAPBS-2026
National Conference
on
“Advances in Pharmaceutical & Biological Sciences”
27-28 February 2026
Conference Theme
“AI-Enabled Pharmaceutical and Biological Processes: Transforming Pharmaceutical and
Biological Sciences through Intelligent Innovations”
Organised by:
School of Pharmaceutical & Biological Sciences, HBTU, Kanpur
About the conference
The conference brings together researchers, industry leaders, healthcare professionals, technologists, and regulators to examine the growing
impact of AI and machine learning in pharmaceutical and biological sciences. It will showcase advanced research, practical applications, and
successful innovations from both academia and industry. The event also aims to strengthen collaboration among pharmaceutical companies,
biotech startups, AI developers, and academic institutions. In addition, it will address the ethical, legal, and regulatory considerations essential for
the responsible and effective adoption of AI in healthcare and life sciences.
Scientific Scope & Sub Themes
Biological Sciences with AI: Pharmaceutical Sciences with AI: Interdisciplinary and Translational Areas:
AI in Genomics and Proteomics AI in drug discovery and Design AI in Personalized and Precision Medicine
Machine Learning for Disease Modeling Predictive Pharmacokinetics and Digital Therapeutics and AI-assisted Clinical Trials
AI in Systems Biology Pharmacodynamics AI for Biomedical Image and Signal Analysis
Computational Biology and Biomarker Discovery AI for Drug Repurposing Ethical AI in Healthcare and Pharma
AI-driven Vaccine design Smart Drug Delivery System Regulatory Challenges in AI Applications
AI in Microbiome Research AI for Quality Assurance in Pharmaceutical AI Startups and Entrepreneurship in Bio-Pharma
Food Biotechnology and Nutraceuticals Manufacturing AI in 3D Bioprinting
Nanotechnology Automated High-Throughput Screening Devices and Diagnostics in Healthcare
AI-driven Environmental Issues and Remediation Renewable Energy and Environmental Sustainability
